HtmlBodyPart.Html: Discover activities for every age and interest at our community recreation center.
Join us for fun community activities, workshops, and celebrations.
Our state-of-the-art facilities are designed for recreation, wellness, and community gatherings.
Meet the dedicated team behind Greenfield Community Recreation Center & Botanical Garden.
Explore the diverse plant species in our botanical garden collection.
Stay up to date with the latest from our community center and botanical garden.

Amenities.Text:
50m lap pool
Family splash area
Lifeguard on duty
Locker rooms
Swim equipment rental

HtmlBodyPart.Html:
Our state-of-the-art Olympic Pool features a 50-meter lap pool with 8 lanes, perfect for competitive swimming and fitness laps. The adjoining family splash area offers a zero-depth entry pool with water features for younger swimmers.

The facility includes heated changing rooms, equipment rental, and certified lifeguards on duty during all operating hours.

Amenities.Text:
Full-size basketball court
Volleyball nets
Bleacher seating
Scoreboard
Storage lockers

HtmlBodyPart.Html: The Main Gymnasium is a versatile indoor sports facility featuring a regulation basketball court that converts to two volleyball courts. With seating for 500 spectators, it hosts our youth basketball leagues, community volleyball nights, and special events throughout the year.

Amenities.Text:
Mirrored walls
Hardwood floors
Yoga mats and blocks
Sound system
Natural lighting

HtmlBodyPart.Html: Our Wellness Studio is a serene space designed for yoga, dance, fitness classes, and mindful movement. The room features floor-to-ceiling mirrors, premium hardwood floors, and natural lighting that creates an inspiring atmosphere for all types of wellness activities.

Amenities.Text:
Soccer field
Baseball diamond
Picnic pavilion
Playground
Parking

HtmlBodyPart.Html: Our outdoor athletic complex features well-maintained playing fields for soccer, baseball, and multi-purpose use. The surrounding grounds include a covered picnic pavilion for community gatherings, a modern playground, and ample parking.

Amenities.Text:
Glass-enclosed greenhouse
Tropical plant collections
Walking paths
Bench seating
Guided tour availability

HtmlBodyPart.Html: The Tropical Conservatory is the crown jewel of our botanical garden. This glass-enclosed greenhouse maintains a warm, humid environment year-round, housing an impressive collection of tropical plants, orchids, and exotic species from around the world.

Sarah has led the Community Recreation Center for over 15 years, transforming it from a small neighborhood facility into the thriving community hub it is today. Under her leadership, the center expanded to include the botanical garden and doubled its program offerings.
Marcus brings a decade of personal training and group fitness experience to the recreation center. He oversees all fitness programs including yoga, strength training, and senior fitness classes.
Jennifer is a former competitive swimmer and certified aquatics instructor. She manages all swim programs from toddler water safety to adult lap swimming and competitive team training.
Dr. Patel holds a PhD in Botany and has curated botanical collections for over 20 years. She oversees all five garden zones and leads the center's plant conservation and education programs.

David coordinates all youth programming including after-school activities, summer camps, and youth sports leagues. His passion for mentoring young people drives the center's commitment to youth development.
Rachel manages all community events, from seasonal festivals to fundraising galas. She works closely with local organizations and volunteers to create memorable experiences for the community.

Our swim lessons program offers instruction for all skill levels, from water safety basics for beginners to stroke refinement for advanced swimmers. Small class sizes ensure personalized attention from our certified instructors.

Each session runs for 8 weeks and includes access to open swim times for additional practice.

Start your day with mindful movement in our morning yoga class. Suitable for all levels, this Vinyasa-style class focuses on building strength, flexibility, and mental clarity in our beautiful Wellness Studio.

Our youth basketball league provides a fun, supportive environment for kids ages 4-12 to learn basketball fundamentals, teamwork, and sportsmanship. The season includes weekly practices and Saturday games.
Explore your creativity in our watercolor workshop series. Each session focuses on different techniques from washes and glazing to wet-on-wet and botanical illustration. All materials provided.
A week-long summer camp combining swimming, outdoor games, arts and crafts, and nature exploration in the botanical garden. For ages 6-12. Includes lunch and snacks.
Join Dr. Patel for a guided tour through all five garden zones. Learn about our plant collections, conservation efforts, and seasonal highlights. Free for members, $10 for non-members.
Our annual end-of-summer community BBQ brings neighbors together for good food, live music, and family fun. Enjoy grilled favorites, lawn games, and a sunset concert on the outdoor fields.

The Grandiflora rose produces large, elegant blooms that combine the best qualities of Hybrid Tea and Floribunda roses. Our collection features several award-winning cultivars in shades of pink, red, and gold.
The Boston Fern is one of the most popular fern varieties, prized for its graceful arching fronds. Native to tropical regions, it thrives in the humidity of our Tropical Conservatory.

Known as Moth Orchids for their wing-shaped petals, Phalaenopsis are among the most beloved orchid genera. Our conservatory houses over 50 varieties, with blooms ranging from pure white to deep magenta.

Summary.Text: Join us in celebrating 25 years of serving our community with special events and activities throughout the month.

MarkdownBodyPart.Markdown:
This year marks the **25th anniversary** of the Community Recreation Center! What began as a modest neighborhood gym has grown into a thriving community hub featuring world-class facilities, an award-winning botanical garden, and programs serving over 10,000 residents each year.

## Anniversary Celebrations

Throughout the month, we're hosting special events to celebrate this milestone:

- **Open House Weekend** - Free admission to all facilities
- **Community Photo Exhibition** - 25 years of memories
- **Anniversary Gala** - A formal celebration with dinner and dancing
- **Time Capsule Ceremony** - Sealing memories for the next 25 years

We couldn't have reached this milestone without the support of our incredible community. Thank you for 25 amazing years!

data.DisplayText: New Summer Programs Now Open for Registration
data.Author: [js: parameters('AdminUsername')]

TitlePart.Title: New Summer Programs Now Open for Registration

Summary.Text: Registration is now open for our exciting lineup of summer programs including swim camps, outdoor adventures, and arts workshops.

MarkdownBodyPart.Markdown:
Summer is just around the corner, and we're thrilled to announce our expanded lineup of summer programs!

## Highlights

- **Summer Splash Camp** for ages 6-12
- **Teen Adventure Series** with hiking and kayaking
- **Botanical Art Classes** in the garden
- **Family Swim Nights** every Friday

Early bird registration discounts are available through May 31. Members receive an additional 15% off all programs.

[Register online](#) or visit the front desk to secure your spot!

data.DisplayText: Rare Orchid Species Added to Conservatory Collection
data.Author: [js: parameters('AdminUsername')]

TitlePart.Title: Rare Orchid Species Added to Conservatory Collection

Summary.Text: Dr. Patel has acquired three rare orchid species for the Tropical Conservatory, including the elusive Ghost Orchid.

MarkdownBodyPart.Markdown:
We're excited to announce the addition of **three rare orchid species** to our Tropical Conservatory collection!

Garden Curator Dr. Elena Patel traveled to Central America to acquire these specimens through a conservation partnership:

1. **Dendrophylax lindenii** (Ghost Orchid) - One of the rarest orchids in the world
2. **Dracula vampira** - Named for its dramatic dark, wing-like petals
3. **Bulbophyllum nocturnum** - The only known orchid that blooms exclusively at night

These additions bring our orchid collection to over 200 species, making it one of the most diverse in the region.

Visit the conservatory to see these remarkable plants. Guided tours highlighting the new arrivals are available every Saturday at 10 AM.

HtmlBodyPart.Html: Learn to swim with certified instructors in our Olympic-size pool.
Start your day with mindful movement in our serene Wellness Studio.
Fun and competitive basketball for kids ages 4-12.
Explore your creativity with guided watercolor techniques.
A week-long adventure of swimming, games, and nature exploration.
Guided tour through all five garden zones with Dr. Patel.
End-of-summer cookout with live music and family fun.
Annual formal celebration supporting center programs and garden conservation.

Content.Html:
About the Community Recreation Center

For 25 years, the Community Recreation Center & Botanical Garden has been the heart of our neighborhood. What started as a small gym with a few classes has grown into a comprehensive community hub offering world-class facilities, diverse programs for all ages, and an award-winning botanical garden.

Our Mission

To enrich lives through recreation, education, and the beauty of nature. We believe every community member deserves access to quality fitness facilities, engaging programs, and green spaces that inspire wonder and connection.

Our Facilities

Our 50-acre campus includes an Olympic-size pool, gymnasium, wellness studio, outdoor athletic fields, and five distinct botanical garden zones. Whether you're training for a marathon, learning to paint, or simply enjoying a walk through the rose garden, there's something here for everyone.

Contact Us

Visit Us

Community Recreation Center & Botanical Garden
123 Community Way
Greenfield, ST 12345

Hours

Monday - Friday: 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM
Saturday - Sunday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Botanical Garden: Dawn to Dusk

Get in Touch

(555) 123-4567
info@communityrec.org

Follow Us

Stay connected on social media for the latest updates on programs, events, and garden happenings.

Welcome to the Botanical Garden

Our botanical garden spans 15 acres and features five distinct zones, each showcasing unique plant collections from around the world. Whether you're a passionate gardener, a nature lover, or simply looking for a peaceful retreat, the garden offers something for everyone.

Garden Zones

  • Rose Garden - Over 200 varieties of heritage and modern roses
  • Tropical Conservatory - A glass-enclosed paradise of tropical plants and orchids
  • Native Woodland - Native trees, wildflowers, and walking trails
  • Herb Garden - Culinary and medicinal herbs from five continents
  • Children's Discovery Garden - Interactive garden spaces designed for young explorers

Visiting Hours

The garden is open daily from dawn to dusk. Guided tours are available every Saturday at 10:00 AM. Admission is free for recreation center members.
